text:
It will perfect for us.
Have you used megascan or have acess to it ?
What tools you have at your disposal at home ?

Great :slightly_smiling_face: I've not used megascans - though I've always wanted to try it - and considering its current subscription cost, it shouldn't be too much of a bother to get it for the sake of this project. As for tools I have I currently have access to maya, zbrush (which is something I want to strengthen my skills in), substance painter/designer, photoshop and unreal engine
